item.title: 银行客户损失 16 亿美元后，泰国严厉打击金融欺诈行为
item.description: 在过去两年中，银行客户因网上金融诈骗损失了 600 多亿泰铢（约合 16 亿美元），因此泰国央行正在加大对此类所谓 "骡子账户 "的打击力度。【原文：Thailand’s central bank is stepping up a crackdown on the so-called mule accounts used in online financial fraud after bank customers lost more than 60 billion baht ($1.6 billion) to such scams in the past two years.】

item.title: 租赁活动回暖，曼哈顿公寓租金仍下跌
item.description: 5 月份，曼哈顿的公寓租金出人意料地出现下滑，在通常最繁忙季节的开端，市场出现了 "横盘 "走势。【原文：Manhattan apartment rents unexpectedly slipped in May, a “sideways” move for the market at the start of one of its typically busiest seasons.】

item.description: 中国电动汽车股上涨，原因是分析师称，欧盟初步宣布的关税上调符合市场预期，对于比亚迪股份有限公司等具有成本优势的公司来说是可控的。【原文：Chinese electric-vehicle stocks gained as analysts said the European Union’s preliminary announcement of tariff increases was in line with market expectations and manageable for companies with cost strength like BYD Co Ltd.】

item.title: 停电抑制经济增长，乌克兰寻求降息
item.description: 乌克兰央行准备连续第三次下调借贷成本，因为决策者们正在权衡俄罗斯打击能源行业对经济增长的影响。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank is poised to make a third straight cut to borrowing costs as policymakers weigh the impact on economic growth of Russian strikes against the energy sector.】

item.title: 申银万国在伦敦首次公开募股大潮中坚韧前行
item.description: 伦敦的银行家们等待首次公开募股反弹已经两年多了。当快速时尚新贵 Shein 可能以 500 亿英镑（约合 640 亿美元）的估值上市的消息首次传出时，伦敦金融城看到了一笔可能最终扭转低迷的交易。【原文：London bankers have waited more than two years for initial public offerings to bounce back. When news of fast-fashion upstart Shein’s potential listing first emerged at a potential £50 billion ($64 billion) valuation, the City saw a deal that could finally reverse the slump.】

item.title: 日本基金出售九年来最大一笔外债
item.description: 在全球央行政策转向的背景下，日本投资者上周抛售了九年来最大量的外债。【原文：Japanese investors sold the largest amount of foreign debt in nine years last week amid a shift in global central bank policy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚失业率降至 4%，招聘工作持续进行
item.description: 澳大利亚上个月的失业率有所下降，就业岗位的增加超出了预期，这凸显了该国劳动力市场对利率上升和高移民潮的抵御能力。【原文：Australian unemployment dipped last month and job gains exceeded estimates, highlighting the resilience of the country’s labor market to elevated interest rates and high immigration.】

item.title: 新加坡港口集装箱堵塞加剧，船舶避开红海
item.description: 新加坡的港口已经是世界上最繁忙的港口之一，随着船只为避开红海而改道，更多的集装箱船驶向这个亚洲海运枢纽，该港口正面临着一个持续拥堵的时期。【原文：Singapore’s port, already one of the busiest in the world, is facing a sustained period of congestion as vessel diversions to avoid the Red Sea push more container ships to the Asian maritime hub.】

item.title: 中国商人价值 2,000 万美元的俄罗斯铜矿失踪
item.description: 中国一家巨型国有大宗商品贸易商在一批来自俄罗斯、价值近 2,000 万美元的铜货物失踪后，损失惨重，这再次引发了人们对原材料买卖市场欺诈行为的担忧。【原文：A giant state-owned Chinese commodities trader is nursing losses after a shipment of copper from Russia worth nearly $20 million went missing, reigniting fears over fraud in the often secretive market for buying and selling raw materials.】

item.title: 在家庭收入不断增长的背景下，印度需要在本十年内建造 1 亿套住房
item.description: 据印度最大的开发商之一的一位高级官员称，随着世界上增长最快的主要经济体家庭收入的不断提高，印度对新住宅的需求日益旺盛，印度住宅建筑商可能需要在本十年内建造多达一亿套新住宅。【原文：Indian home builders may have to construct as many as 100 million new dwelling units this decade as rising household incomes in the world’s fastest-growing major economy buoy demand for new residences, according to a top official at one of the country’s largest developers.】

item.title: PAG 为新亚洲私募股权基金筹集的资金仅为目标 90 亿美元的一半
item.description: 亚洲最大的另类资产管理公司 PAG 将于本月晚些时候完成其最新收购基金 40 亿美元的筹款，达到原定目标的一半以下，熟悉此事的人士说，因为投资者不愿意向该地区投入新的现金。【原文：PAG, Asia’s biggest manager of alternative assets, will close the fundraising for its latest buyout fund at $4 billion later this month, reaching less than half of its original target as investors balk at putting new cash into the region, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 石油连涨三天后趋于平稳，库存和美联储成为关注焦点
